name: Jellicent
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Its body is mostly seawater. It’s said there’s a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

abilities.name: Spiteful Spirit
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent’s attack, the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Aqua Bullet
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
